attributes.action: Provide Domestic Abuse and Intimate Partner Violence education at school age
attributes.additional_details:
Despite some resources in place surrounding Domestics abuse and Intimate Partner Violence, these are predominantly based on helping and educating AFTER the event or events have happened. 
We need to educate the next generations BEFORE these events and behaviours develop.
attributes.background:
Introduce educational programmes for boys and girls at school age, on this subject
Provide extra resources and support for those already caught up in abusive family environments.
Address Domestic Abuse and Intimate Partner Violence with younger individuals to implement change at a younger age.

rejection.details:
Domestic abuse is already in the National Curriculum, but you might like to sign the following petition we currently have open on this issue: 

Provide funding to improve the quality of teaching in schools of sexual violence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580038
